mdRecord.dcterms:title: Photograph, Page Randolph Anderson Platt, Vice Regent for Pennsylvania, dressed as Lady Washington, 1910
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: The Foltz Photographic Postals
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Black and white photographic print postcard showing Page Randolph Anderson Platt as a young girl dressed as Lady Washington, 1910. She later became Vice Regent for Pennsylvania. Unknown photographer, printed as a postcard by Foltz Photographic Postals, Savannah, GA. See DA_001978 for her mother's photograph in the same dress.
